name: 2019 9th International Conference on Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (ICBBB 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: ICBBB 2019 Shining Points: 1\. Accepted and registered papers can be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, or published in International Journal of Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (IJBBB, ISSN: 2010-3638). 2\. Prof. Wing-Kin Sung from National University of Singapore, Singaporeï¼ŒProf. Satoru Miyano from The University of Tokyo, Japan, Prof. Tatsuya Akutsu from Kyoto University, Japan, Prof. Kuo-Sheng Cheng from National Cheng Kung University, Taiwan and Assoc. Prof. Hiroyuki KUDO from Meiji University, Japan have joined as Speakers. 3\. ICBBB 2019 will be held in National University of Singapore. 4\. One Day Visit will be arranged on January 9, 2019\. == Paper Publishing: ICBBB 2019 papers can be published in International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, or published in International Journal of Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics (IJBBB, ISSN: 2010-3638).
